title: Nature's Remedy Clinic - Woodland Hills, CA
description: Specialties: We offer Physiotherapy and Chiropractic care for a range of issues from Sport Injury, Slip & Fall Injury, Auto Accident, Work Accident, as well as family care. Established in 2004. Dr. Razipour practice is a drug-free, hands-on approach to health care that utilizes spinal manipulation, physiotherapy, therapeutic massage, exercise and lifestyle counseling, all in an effort to help you achieve optimal wellness. Keeping the body in alignment and functioning properly is essential to getting and staying healthy. I believe that true healing is achieved when the patient is fully engaged in their own health and wellbeing. It is about balance and it is about choices. Choosing the right health care provider is one of the most important decisions that you can make today.
